```{r setup}
library(plinkr)
```
Here we create the filename with parameters:

```{r create_sim_file}
sim_filename <- tempfile("plink_qt_", fileext = ".sim")
# From https://zzz.bwh.harvard.edu/plink/simulate.shtml#sim3
text <- "10 qtl 0.05 0.95  0.01 0"
readr::write_lines(x = text, file = sim_filename)
```

```{r sim}
if (plinkr::is_plink_installed()) {
  # From https://zzz.bwh.harvard.edu/plink/simulate.shtml#sim3
  args <- c(
    "--simulate-qt", sim_filename, 
    "--simulate-n", "2"
  ) 
  plinkr::run_plink(args)
}
```
